public class ActivitiAndBusinessServiceImpl
extends ActivitiBaseServiceImpl
implements IActivitiAndBusinessService

      • startProcess

        @Transactional(readOnly=false,
               propagation=REQUIRED)
public String startProcess(Map<String,Object> paramMap,
                                Map commitMap,
                                String rootPath,
                                String processDefineKey)
                    throws com.dqgb.sshframe.common.exception.ServiceException
        指定者:
        startProcess 在接口中 IActivitiAndBusinessService
        参数:
        paramMap - 启动流程实例所需要的参数,以及需要放到申请任务节点url上的数据
        commitMap - 提交给流程引擎保存的数据
        rootPath - 系统根路径
        processDefineKey - 流程模板定义key
        返回:
        String processInstance 流程实例ID
        抛出:
        com.dqgb.sshframe.common.exception.ServiceException
